body: Pull -request merged.
Hey, don't you want to add http://rusvectores.org/ru/about/ too? Is it supported out of the box?
Ok, but this is not a "feat" because no new functionality was added. This is a "fix".

It is not the issue of running on Windows, the same error raises on Linux.

The documentation and config files are still not ready for use. Fully functional library version will be released soon.

@vikmary I know it's not, i have issues with compiling 
fasttext==0.8.3
kenlm==0.0.0 on windows, but i think i can figure it out, 
I just want some start code to play with and extend. Currently i am planning architecture for my DPA, and DeepPavlov looks promising, but i can't see the full picture =(

> i am getting error
>```
>deeppavlov.core.common.errors.ConfigError: "Provided ser_path doesn't exist!"
>```
The error means that all directories from `ser_path`'s in your config must already exist.

And it is raised because interaction with `hcn_new` expects that you have already pretrained named entity recognition model (see [`models/ner`](https://github.com/deepmipt/Pilot/blob/master/deeppavlov/models/ner)), intents classifier (see [`models/classifiers/intents`](https://github.com/deepmipt/Pilot/blob/master/deeppavlov/classifiers/intents))  and hybrid code network model itself (see [`skills/hcn_new`](https://github.com/deepmipt/Pilot/blob/master/deeppavlov/skills/hcn_new)).

I recommend you to wait until we upload pretrained model files. Or you can train `models/ner/config.json` and `models/classifiers/intents/config.json` in order to be able to then train and use `skills/hcn_new/config.json`.

>Where can i get `word_vocab.dict`?

`word_vocab.dict` will be created during `hcn_new` training.
resolved
merged
fixed

Hi, looks like sth is messed up with your tf installation. You have installed tensorflow==1.4.0 on your python virtual env, however, the real tf running version is 1.1.0. Look at these paths:
d:\nwani\l\tensorflow_1498062690615\work\tensorflow-1.1.0\tensorflow\core\platform\cpu_feature_guard.cc:45]

Also it requires names like "lstm_cell/biases' to be present at the checkpoint, this is an old tf naming convention.

I suggest you upgrade your tf version on d:\
Thanks you and sorry for disturb with such dump questions!
Есть ли пример, где добавление такой составляющей в функцию ошибки, дало прирост качества?

Примера сейчас нет, но я пробовал эту модель, и основная проблема была в том, что сама маска в обучении не участвует (почти, если не ошибаюсь, там влияние маски учитывается через предыдущее действие).  Если рабочем режиме ее убрать, то модель сильно теряет в качестве.
Протестируйте. Самому интересно. Должно давать эффект.
Расстояние (косинусное, например), между выходным вектором и его вариантом, умноженным на маску. Лучше с понижающим параметром (a=0.01, например). Добавить к ошибке в качестве регуляризации.

Да, в текущей реализации маска учитывается через предыдущее действие; при инфере форсится домножением.
Идея интересная, подумаем над тем, чтобы реализовать
Если оформите в виде pull-request, потесчу и рассмотрю мёрж

Please make pull requests to master.
[slack](https://ipavlov.slack.com/archives/C897QJ7HC/p1517495138000173)
Incorrect pull request, mill correct to vectors -> master
в секции `Train run` "bash" нормально рендерится
Может, `config_examples` -> `configs`?
rename go_bot_rnn to go_bot_rnn?
problem has gone after i manually installed Cython and NumPy

Read the readme, please. Specifically, the [installation](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov#installation) part:

> 4. Install the requirements:
> `python setup.py install`

Hi,

You should have installed Python 3.6 on your venv, it is mentioned in the [README:](https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/blob/master/README.md#installation)
```
1. Create a virtual environment with Python 3.6
```
We didn't test it with Python 3.5, so the behavior can be unexpected.
Renamed download files and configs.
Please read about [git semantic commits](https://seesparkbox.com/foundry/semantic_commit_messages) and make proper commit messages.

In current version before evaluating the model, its `save_path` block in config is written over its `load_path`. But model in go_bot configs itself does not have save and load path, they are in its children, so config parser does not know, what to do.
We can try and do the paths thing deeper in the model's config tree, but i'm not sure that it's the right way.

Could you, please, provide more info: 
do you try to run pre-trained model? 
which embedding model do you use?

python deep.py interactbot skills/go_bot/config.json -t <TELEGRAM_TOKEN>
This error arises when one trying to download pre-trained model but provides with another embedding file (not with which it was trained).

This error arises when one tries to run pre-trained model with another embedding file (not this one with which it was trained).
Running the following command:
```
python deep.py interactbot skills/go_bot/config.json -t <TELEGRAM_TOKEN>
```
you are trying to run pre-trained models that previously should be downloaded within the following command:
```
python download.py
```
Did you run this command to download necessary files?
